channel.title: [459] OldRune - Easy economy, Perfect PKing
channel.description:
[B]Welcome to OldRune's advertisement thread.[/B]
Homepage: [url=http://www.oldrune.net/title.ws]http://www.oldrune.net/title.ws[/url]
Client download: [url=https://dl.dropbox.com/u/41084245/Oldrune/oldrune.jar]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/41084245/Oldrune/oldrune.jar[/url]
OldRune is a server that is made to bring back the Old-School PKing during the 2007 era. There are no custom items, and nothing outside the 459 revision.
[B][SIZE="4"]list of features:[/SIZE][/B] - Perfected combat - Clipped following and combat (diagonal fixed) - Easy economy - Use :: pure to get straight into PKing - (temporary) lots of shops to get supplies from - All skills trainable - Working duel arena
[B][SIZE="4"]Media:[/SIZE][/B]
Welcome screen: [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/41084245/Img/Welcome%20Screen.png[/img]
Pest control: [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/41084245/Img/Pest%20Control.png[/img]
Pest control Rewards: [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/41084245/Img/Pest%20Control%20Shop.png[/img]
Kalphite Queen (First form): [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/41084245/Img/Kalphite%20Queen.png[/img]
Kalphite Queen (Second form): [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/41084245/Img/Kalphite%20Queen%20Second%20form.png[/img]
PKing: [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/41084245/Img/Active%20Pking.png[/img]
Realistic features: [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/41084245/Img/Home%20Teleport.png[/img]

Welcome to OldRune’s advertisement thread.

Homepage:
http://www.oldrune.net/title.ws

Client download:
https://dl.dropbox.com/u/41084245/Oldrune/oldrune.jar

OldRune is a server that is made to bring back the Old-School PKing during the 2007 era. There are no custom items, and nothing outside the 459 revision.

[SIZE=“4”]list of features:[/SIZE]

  • Perfected combat
  • Clipped following and combat (diagonal fixed)
  • Easy economy
  • Use :: pure to get straight into PKing
  • (temporary) lots of shops to get supplies from
  • All skills trainable
  • Working duel arena
